creditline: Gift of Dr. Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg in honor of Elizabeth K. Mix (Menon)
medium: Black ink and watercolor on cream wove paper
provenance: [Possibly Galerie Dominique Weitz, Paris, until about 1995, to Mix]; Elizabeth Mix, Indianapolis; her gift to Yvonne and Gabriel Weisberg, Minneapolis (until 2018; given to Mia)
signed: Lower left in black ink: Danseuse Orientale
title: Dancer in Orientalist Costume (Danseuse orientale)
